text: Betula browicziana is a species of plant in the Betulaceae family. It is found in Georgia and Turkey. ==References== * Güner, A. 1998. Betula browicziana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. browicziana Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
